title: Dementia risk is high for people with atrial fibrillation, shows research
description: For people with atrial fibrillation, one of our most common cardiac disorders, dementia risk is elevated. This is shown by a University of Gothenburg thesis based on research at population level.

title: Early Aspirin Cuts In-Hospital Mortality With Moderate COVID-19
description: Largest benefits seen for patients older than 60 years with no increased risk for hemorrhagic complications
content:
WEDNESDAY, March 30, 2022 (HealthDay News) -- Early aspirin use is associated with lower odds of 28-day in-hospital mortality among U.S. adults hospitalized with moderate COVID-19, according to a study published online March 24 in JAMA Network Open.
